name: Sheep Hero Legend Defense
description:
"The sheep pasture is being invaded they're not going to take it anymore!

Sheep Hero Legend Defense is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages.

Do you think you have what it takes to protect the pasture from the danger it faces? Can you collect enough food to keep the sheep going? The game will start moving faster and faster, so watch out for those wild animals!

Collect enough food and you can unlock more sheep for even more fun!

*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect food to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch

Download Sheep Hero Legend Defense right now while it's 100% FREE!"
